text: "Whatever You Say" is a 1999 song by country singer Martina McBride and is the fifth and final single from her fourth studio album Evolution. It went to number 37 in the United States, number 2 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 6 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart. ==References== Category:1999 songs Category:Country songs Category:Martina McBride songs
title: Whatever You Say
